tool_description: Identifies and analyzes theological terms and concepts within scriptural passages, providing definitions, denominational interpretations, and doctrinal significance.

text.description: Scriptural text containing theological terms to analyze

denominational_perspective.description: Denominational viewpoints to include in analysis

term_complexity.description: Level of theological terms to identify: basic, intermediate, advanced

historical_context.description: Include historical development of theological terms

error_messages: Text too short: Provide sufficient text for theological term identification.
Unknown denominational perspective: Specify recognized denominational viewpoints.
Invalid complexity level: Use one of [basic, intermediate, advanced].
No theological terms found: The provided text contains no identifiable theological terminology.
usage: Input scriptural text and specify analysis parameters including denominational perspectives and complexity level. Returns identification and analysis of theological concepts present in the text.

identified_terms.description: Theological terms and concepts identified in the text

definitions.description: Definitions and explanations for each identified term

denominational_variations.description: How different denominations interpret each term
